name: flow-map
description: A full-stack application for tracking expenses, managing cash flow, and visualizing financial analytics.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run client" "npm run server" "npm run studio"
scripts.update: npm run generate && npm run migrate
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
